aws:cdk:cloudformation:props.definition:
type Meeting {
    id: ID
    name: String!
    day: Int
    slug: String
    time: String
    end_time: String
    group: String
    notes: String
    updated: String
    url: String
    types: [String]
    address: String
    city: String
    state: String
    postal_code: String
    country: String
    approximate: Boolean
    rating: Int
    reviews: [String]
}

type Query {
    listMeetings(city: String, state: String, postal_code: String, day: Int): [Meeting]
    getMeetingById(meetingId: ID!): Meeting
}

type Mutation {
    createMeeting(meeting: MeetingInput!): Meeting
    updateMeeting(meeting: UpdateMeetingInput!): Meeting
}

input MeetingInput {
    name: String!
    day: Int
    slug: String
    time: String
    end_time: String
    group: String
    notes: String
    url: String
    address: String
    city: String
    state: String
    postal_code: String
    country: String
    approximate: Boolean
    rating: Int
}

input UpdateMeetingInput {
    id: ID!
    name: String
    day: Int
    slug: String
    time: String
    end_time: String
    group: String
    notes: String
    url: String
    address: String
    city: String
    state: String
    postal_code: String
    country: String
    approximate: Boolean
    rating: Int
}

type Subscription {
    onUpdateMeeting: Meeting @aws_subscribe(mutations: ["updateMeeting"])
}
